scripts.dev: concurrently "cd packages/web && pnpm dev" "cd packages/client && pnpm dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd packages/web && pnpm build" "cd packages/client && pnpm build"
scripts.mv: rimraf dist && concurrently "mv packages/client/dist dist" "mv packages/web/dist dist"
scripts.package: pnpm build && pnpm mv && concurrently "env-cmd -f packages/client/.env.production electron-builder -c packages/client/builder.json"
